Regarding the safety of the software downloads, you can use online virus scanning tools such as VirusTotal to verify the safety of the downloads for different operating systems. The links provided for MacOS, Linux-AMD64, Linux-ARM64, and Windows allow you to check the detection results for each software download. This can help you determine if the software is safe to use on your system.

In summary, when using the Verus software, you must be aware of the risks involved and the terms of use. You should also take steps to verify the safety of the software downloads for your operating system, and comply with the copyright and permission notices.
